attributes.action: I would like to call on a ban of all online gambling.
attributes.additional_details:
I would like the government to take action and ban all online gambling, mobile gambling and all gambling advertising.
It is too accessible for people with gambling problems, and a ban of online gambling, advertising, and gambling on the phone would help to reduce the numbers of people who suffer daily from this addiction and incur debt, causing themselves and their families misery.  Online gambling is ethically and morally wrong.
